topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54c155f763687218b8950200#post_54c155f763687218b8950200
Oh hey; Whatevs have you heard the usa is going into deflation?  Short explanation is that thanks to oil prices being down the usa is going into deflation.

Upside:
People's incomes in the usa will go much further and that it'll be easier for people in the usa to live on their incomes.
Downsides:
The oil industry in the USA is having a hard time.
Prices for american made products will become more expensive for those outside the usa.
It'll be harder for the usa and people to pay off debts.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
Okay, I'll admit this about Attack on Titan. Some of the designs for the Titans be quite silly, which kind of ruins the whole 'scary monster' angle they're going for.

Like this one:
!https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/236x/4e/c7/39/4ec7393a24fe81064f30643c03a9bb03.jpg!

And this one:
!http://blog-imgs-51.fc2.com/y/a/r/yaraon/1367765479777.jpg!

And then there are Titans who come off as more silly than scary
Like this one:
!http://img1.ak.crunchyroll.com/i/spire3/061c420aed17d6dae577cb403e2b5d541368324519_full.gif!

And even _this_ one looks he's stoned or something, despite being pretty significant in the show, albeit briefly:
!http://static.comicvine.com/uploads/original/14/146226/3046963-ckzvs2g.jpeg!

*But let's not forget about these guys:*
!http://i.imgur.com/Jbchzhc.jpg!
!http://img3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130618170835/shingekinokyojin/images/thumb/e/e9/Armored_Titan's_appearance.png/500px-Armored_Titan's_appearance.png!
!http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130602170229/shingekinokyojin/images/6/63/Colossal_Titan_anime.png!
*They are the reminders of why the Titans are to be truly feared.*
topics.author: 536f7a11636872666e2d0000

Or just weird and silly looking.
